column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////A wonderful place to celebrate a special event with a group
column2: this was the perfect choice for our group of 12. The menu works well with great variety to satisfy all. It was helpful to have one person coordinate the orders. After a couple cheese plates as appetizers
column3: we ordered many tapas to share
column4: and 2 servings of 3 different Paello to share
column5: and had plenty of food. Yes u can always order more! And the pitchers of sangria
column8: and one red). Â Highly recommend
column9: several of our group had been before and chose this for a grad celebration
